verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are the light
Song of my life
You always lead me
You are the voice inside

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are my love
No one before you
All that I am
Points to You

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And I was made by you
I was made for you
I am unfulfilled without full communion

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You are the light
Song of my life
You always lead me
You are the voice inside

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
You are my love
No one before you
All that I am
Longs For You

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: And I was made by you

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
I was made for you
I am unfulfilled without full communion

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
I was made by you
And I was made for you
I am unfulfilled without full communion

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Since your love got a hold of me
Since your love got a hold of me
I’m a new creation
I’m forever changed

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
I was made by you
I was made for you
I am unfulfilled without full communion

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
In you, is all I need
You’re my breath, you’re my life, you’re my everything
